healthABM

Class MedicalCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • healthABM.MedicalCondition

  • public class MedicalCondition
extends java.lang.Object
    The class medical condition refers to actual medical conditions of a patient. Contrary to the class Illness (blueprint of each possible illness), this class is always linked to a patient. Once the medical condition is cured, the instance of this class disappears.
    Author:
    Florian

    • Method Detail

      • getMedConditionID

        public double getMedConditionID()

      • getCurrentSeverity

        public double getCurrentSeverity()
        Returns the current level of severity (which is always stored at index = 0)
        Returns:
        current level of severity as double

      • getSeverity

        public double getSeverity(int t)
        This method returns the severity t periods in the past. For instance, if the argument is 2, then the severity of tick-2 is returned. In case the medical condition did not yet exist back then, the value of 0.0 is returned. If you wish the severity in the current period, you can either use the argument t=0 or the alternative method getCurrentSeverity()
        Parameters:
        t - Number of periods in the past (e.g. 3 would refer to 3 ticks before the current tick. Only positive integers are allowed.
        Returns:
        severity as double or zero (0.0) if the medical condition did not yet exist back then.

      • getDuration

        public int getDuration(boolean visible)
        Returns the duration of the medical condition. The argument visible switches from duration with visible symptoms (TRUE) to the duration since the medical condition actually exists (FALSE). Note that the value when putting visible=FALSE is always larger or equal. Let us take an example. If an illness has visible symptoms after 3 ticks and the medical condition started in tick 10, the values returned in tick 15 are 2 when putting visible=TRUE and 5 otherwise.
        Parameters:
        visible - Boolean to indicate if we want the duration of visible symptoms or the duration of the medical condition in general. For not yet visible medical conditions the value of zero is returned if visible=TRUE
        Returns:
        Duration as int

      • setCurrentSeverity

        public void setCurrentSeverity(double value)
        Sets the current severity value at position 0 (index=0). The index can be interpreted as number of ticks in the past
        Parameters:
        value - current severity of the medical condition

      • treat

        public void treat()
        This method modifies the severity of the medical condition. If no treatment is available (null), the severity is increased by the amount stored in the class Illness.deltaSeverityWoTreatment. If a treatment is available, the severity is reduced by {link Treatment.deltaSeverityUnderTreatment (actually summed given that the value is negative)

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Deletes all links from the medical condition to other objects. To be used right before the object is dropped from the context.

      • describe

        public void describe()
        Prints a short description of the medical condition to the console. Used only for testing purposes
